description: Specify the number of samples for which the cross fade effect has to last. At the end of the cross fade effect the first input audio will be completely silent. Default is 44100.
name: nb_samples

description: Specify the number of samples for which the cross fade effect has to last. At the end of the cross fade effect the first input audio will be completely silent. Default is 44100.
name: ns

description: Specify the duration of the cross fade effect. See (ffmpeg-utils)the Time duration section in the ffmpeg-utils(1) manual for the accepted syntax. By default the duration is determined by nb_samples. If set this option is used instead of nb_samples.
name: duration

description: Specify the duration of the cross fade effect. See (ffmpeg-utils)the Time duration section in the ffmpeg-utils(1) manual for the accepted syntax. By default the duration is determined by nb_samples. If set this option is used instead of nb_samples.
name: d

description: Should first stream end overlap with second stream start. Default is enabled.
name: overlap

description: Should first stream end overlap with second stream start. Default is enabled.
name: o

description: Set curve for cross fade transition for first stream.
name: curve1

description:
Set curve for cross fade transition for second stream.

For description of available curve types see afade filter description.
name: curve2
